A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This is the worst Star Wars movie in existence. Without spoiling anything: 1.) legacy characters are disrespected\, 2.) the new characters are totally forgettable and horribly written\, 3.) the movie is thematically inconsistent\, 4.) it contradicts the greater Star Wars mythos\, and 5.) it neuters any hype for the final chapter of the trilogy. Garbage.
